content:
posborne opened PR #10964 from posborne:stack-switching-rename-vmarray to bytecodealliance:main:

VMArray from the original stack switching impl was renamed to VMHostArray, but the prefixes used in vmoffsets didn't get updated.

Original Discussion:
https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/pull/10388#discussion_r2114329856

Original (incomplete) Change: 22bf039e801f0e92048a2ce508dc27289fbb27ae

  • Explain why this change is needed. If the details are in an issue already,
    this can be brief.
